result.execSummary:
The defendant Ethan Michael Score was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

supervisions.notes: All costs, fees, and other surcharges have been paid in full from the bond funds posted in this matter.
The defendant must provide DNA and pay the surcharge; the analysis may be expunged upon application to the Department of Justice.

If the defendant has no additional criminal allegations against him that rise to the level of probable cause for a period of 1 year from sentencing, he may petition the court to have this matter expunged from his record.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ethan Michael Score

records.addlTxt: 2:42 PM Cases 21CT44, 2021CT000045, 2021CT000050, 2021CT000058, 2021CT000063, 2021TR000501, 2021TR000703, and 2022CM000035 called together.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan Michael Score in court.  Attorney Cheryl Marie Gill appeared by video for Ethan Michael Score. Case is on for Plea/Sentencing Hearing.  Court reviews PLQ- notes error in the agreement; discussion.  Agreement is recited def pleading G to 1 misdemeanor count in 22CM35 (either ct 2 or ct 3); joint rec for court costs.  Court asks def if they understand the agreement.  Def does.  Court reviews Def's constitutional rights.  Def understands that def is waiving those rights by entering into agreement today.  Court asks Def if they understand Court is not bound by agreement, and could order maximum penalties.  Def understands.  Court asks for plea.  Def enters a plea of Guilty.  Court finds def is making plea knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily.  Court finds a factual basis to accept the plea.  Court finds defendant guilty of Count 3 of 22CM35: misdemeanor bail jumping and orders a JOC; remaining counts and cases are DRI.  DA asks Court to accept agreement.  Defense attorney asks Court to accept agreement.  Def declines to make a statement to the Court.  Court orders 60 days jail (60 days jail credit- time served) $500 court costs and fines; def has 30 days to pay or set up a payment plan with the Clerk of Courts.  If def has no additional criminal charges that rise to a level of probable cause for a period of 1 year, he may petition the court to have this matter expunged from his record.  Appeal rights provided.  DNA to be provided to the Sheriff before leaving the building. Def to provide prints in cases that need them.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:19 PM Cases 21CT44, 2021CT000045, 2021CT000050, 2021CT000058, 2021CT000063, and 2022CM000035 called together.  Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan Michael Score in court.  Attorney Cheryl Marie Gill appeared by video for Ethan Michael Score.  Atty Gill makes statement as to the PLQ- did not receive a signed copy back from the defendant.  Can't proceed to plea/sentencing.  Def to review and discuss PLQ prior to next week.  Def updates- obtained a valid license, shows proof to the State.  State recites original offer, but in light of the def's license- the new offer is for plea to Ct 3 and for straight court costs at sentencing.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 11, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

09:06 AM 21CT44, 21CT45, 21CT50, 21TR58, 21CT63, 22CM34 called scheduled for PLEAS.  Defendant, Ethan Michael Score, appeared in person with Attorney Cheryl Marie Gill by video.  Attorney James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State in person.  Court reviews def's right to have all parties in courtroom, def waives right to have Attny in person.  Def updates court on DL process.  Attny Gill notes has not been able to get PLQ to def.  Agreement is recited by Attorney Gill  offer is to plead G to counts 2 & 3 in 22CM35, rest would be dismissed.  State would have no objection to expungement.  Attny Gill says that would be an item she would argue for. Court defines expungement to def.  Court notes Attny may mail PLQ to def then review word for word and have def bring to next court date.  Very important to proceed with getting DL.  Attny may email PLQ to parent's email.    Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:35 AM Cases 21CT44, 21CT45, 21CT50, 21CT58, 21CT63, and 22CM35 called together.  Defendant Ethan Michael Score in court with attorney Cheryl Marie Gill.  Defendant in custody.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Ethan Michael Score appeared by video means with Attorney.  Def appears from Barron County Jail.  Case on for Status Conference.  Off the record 9:37 am.  Back on the record 9:39 am, same appearances.  Defense attorney updates the Court: def wants to accept offer.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on April 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:31 AM Cases 21CT44, 21CT45, 21CT50, 21CT58, 21CT63, 22CM35 called together.  Defendant Ethan Michael Score in court with attorney Cheryl Marie Gill.  Defendant in custody appearing from Barron County Jail.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Ethan Michael Score appeared by video means with Attorney.  Cases on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: needs another status, newly appointed.  State notes he did provide a written offer to the defendant; recites: plead G to Counts 2 and 3 of 22CM35, DRI remaining, parties free to argue for sentencing.  Bond continues.  If agreement is reached, Atty Gill may obtain a different date for a plea.  Status conference scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on March 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.

01:35 PM Cases 21CT44, 21CT45, 21CT50, 21CT58, 21CT63, and 22CM35 called together.  Defendant Ethan Michael Score in court, in custody.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ethan Michael Score appeared by video means.  Def appears from Burnett County Jail.  Def has not applied for a PD.  Def intends to represent himself.  Case 22CM35 on for an Initial Appearance.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights.  Def enters NG pleas.  Def updates on license- needs to take a test.  Court strongly encourages def to obtain counsel.  Status conference scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.

The defendant must post $2500 cash bond to be released from custody.  Bond to cover Burnett County cases 21CT44, 21CT45, 21CT50, 21CT58, 21CT63, and 22GF48.  The defendant shall not drive without a valid driver's license.
